data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 369,800 people living in Ruyigi through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ruyigi, Burundi
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ruyigi, Burundi a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Ruyigi.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Ruyigi who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Ruyigi do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 233,802 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ruyigi, Burundi has a population of 369,800.

We estimate Ruyigi has 111,561 people who might know Jesus, 233,802 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 24,437 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ruyigi, Burundi to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
